General.Name: Erold SA
General.Description: Erold SA publishes consumer Websites in France. It operates Planet.fr, which provides news and entertainment; E-sante.fr that offers health and well-being related services; Medisite.fr, that specializes in health services; Alpen.mc, online store that specializes in natural health services. The company was formerly known as PlanetMedia SA and changed its name to Erold SA in March 2022. Erold SA is based in Paris, France.
General.Address: 93 rue de la Victoire, Paris, France, 75009
